Runtime.Architecture: DDD + Hexagonal; domain/application free of Spring/JPA/transport dependencies.

Database.Rules: Disable Open-Session-in-View; equals/hashCode by business key; optimistic locking with @Version.

Cache.Usage: Cache recent quotes, exchange rates, and pricebook snapshots with TTL.

Messaging.Pattern: Transactional outbox for outbound events; idempotent consumers.

External.Service: FX provider (optional) for exchange rates; cached with TTL

Security.Auth: OAuth2/OIDC JWT; PRICING_ADMIN for write; SERVICE/BUYER for read
Security.Validation: Bean Validation on DTOs; domain invariants in domain layer

Observability.Metrics: Micrometer + Prometheus; business metrics: quote latency, success/failure, cache hit rate, campaign usage
Observability.Logging: Structured JSON with block anchors (PRICE-BASE/OPTIONS/DISCOUNT/TAX) expressing decisions

Resilience.Retries: Circuit breakers/retries for transient failures; idempotent consumers

Testing.Unit: Domain pricing rules, rounding, tax, discount application
Testing.Integration: Testcontainers for PostgreSQL/Redis/Kafka; gRPC tests if enabled
Testing.Architecture: ArchUnit enforcing hexagonal boundaries and shared-kernel purity
